title: How ida choose arm Thumb/Thumb2
content:
I load binary file to ida and choose arm cpu.

How can I see if ida choose on arm/arm Thumb2 / arm Thumb? and how can I change it?

Bytes translate is depend witch arm is it(arm/arm Thumb2 / arm Thumb)

answers_data.content: ALT+G switches ARM\Thumb\Thumb2. I guess IDA uses heuristics to do that, e.g. if you see BX or BLX to an address that doesn't fit 4 bytes then it must be Thumb mode.
